summary: THE DOOR AJAR WARNING LIGHT KEEP COMING ON FOR MY DRIVERS SIDE DOOR EVEN THOUGH ALL DOORS ARE CLOSED AND FULLY LATCHED. THE LIGHTS STAY ON AFTER THE THE CAR HAS BEEN PARKED AND ALL DOORS CLOSED, CAUSING THE BATTERY TO DRAIN QUICKLY. THE WARNING WILL ALSO COME ON WHILE I AM DRIVING AND EACH TIME I COME TO A STOP. PROBLEM IS INTERMITTENT. IT WILL DO IT MOST OF THE TIME AND THEN OCCASIONALLY, THE DOOR AJAR WILL WORK PROPERLY.
